longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days (not
applicable to holders of Emergency and Temporary Passport, who
must obtain a visa on arrival):
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of an ROC (Taiwan) Business and Academic Travel Card, issued
by Chinese Taipei. 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of Emergency or Temporary
passports issued to nationals of Denmark can obtain a visa on
arrival, for a max. stay of 30 days. Fee: varies depending on
nationality. (SEE NOTE 43278) 
    NOTE 43278: Available only at Taiwan Taoyuan International
   Airport (TPE), Kaohsiung (KHH), Taichung (RMQ) or Taipei
   Song Shan (TSA).
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Denmark will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- For children (up to/incl. 19 years) traveling
  
Additional Information:
- A valid visa in an expired passport
  
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination.
- Former nationals of China (People's Rep.)
   
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
